description:
Formaggio uses his Stand, Tiny Feet, to shrink Narancia so he`s only a few centimeters tall and captures him so that he can force him to tell him where the boss`s daughter Trish is. He puts Narancia into a bottle along with a spider and questions him on Trish`s whereabouts. Narancia is determined not to tell Formaggio anything and uses Li`l Bomber to fight back.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ナランチャのエアロスミス
